resources.string: Scan the barcode to connect with device

1. Scan the barcode 
2. Notification will appear on the screen, just click on Pair & Connect 
4. After connecting, a scanner will give a beep sound, and success message will be shown.
Navigate to \"Settings > About Phone > Status > Bluetooth Address\" or
Then write down the Bluetooth address.
Hit back button until return to this screen.
